issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Allow UDF usage without registry
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9950](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9950). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a functionality relevant only for the DataFrame API.

Sometimes a UDF declaration happens during planning, and it makes it very expressive when the user does not have to access the registry at all to plan the UDF.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9950?focusedCommentId=17194769) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8144
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8144>
